commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Sorry I'm late.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We've been waiting for you, Setsuna. Wait, what's the matter?! You look absolutely exhausted.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I wanted to campaign more like Mifune, so I spoke to some of the students.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But it seems I didn't give very good advice based on their perplexed looks.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You can't expect it to go smoothly since you're not used to this kind of thing. I'm sure it'll go better next time if you learn from your experience today.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Yes... You're right. I must give it my all!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, Setsu! Have a look at this election poster! Rinari and I are pretty proud of it!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Maybe we should've made it cuter. Rina-chan Board says, "Heart-pounding."

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Wow! "Let's create a school for the people, by the people!" That's exactly the message I want to push. Let's go with this!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: All right! Time to start a counterattack with our amazing new poster!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Giggle* Right! I'll give it my all!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Counterattack, start!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Everyone, listen up!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, Kasumi! Club's already started. Where have you been? We're supposed to be helping Setsuna with her election campaign.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: *Huff* *Huff* Detective Kasumin has dug up more info on Shioriko Mifune for the election!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She's an academically-gifted daughter of a distinguished family, right?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: That's not all. There's a lot more to her background story.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: She has the skills to be an instructor of tea ceremonies and flower arrangement, and she's won a debate tournament before! She's a genuinely perfect human!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: It seems like you've just become a fan of hers or something, Kasumi.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Who are you calling a fan?! I think I am the cutest around, so I don't become a fan of others!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, that's not what I came to say. Ahem. Setsuna, on the other hand...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Huh, me?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I figured I should put together a comparison of you two.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Setsuna's hobbies are light novels, manga, anime, and video games. School idol activities excluded, she's quite indoorsy so that she can watch her pre-recorded anime, and...

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Please stop! Don't expose me!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Anime and video games are the sources of energy you use to spread your love!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Ack... That follow-up just now struck me like an arrow, even if it was from you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, whoops! I'm s-sorry!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Okay, okay, that's enough. Look, no matter how perfect a girl Mifune might be, you won't lose without a fight. Right, Setsuna?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I know quite well how much you hate losing.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Th-That's a given!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Then we'll also do our best to help with your election preparations. Let's build this up one block at a time, Setsuna!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: How far have we gotten with gathering her achievements in student council activities?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Um, up until around spring, maybe? We haven't gathered all of the rest yet.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We should be able to get it done in a flash if we all work together! Let's pour all of our efforts into gathering the data!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Right, then time to start this week's meeting! But, before that, can I eat a hamburger? There's a new one out that I'm just dying to try!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What are you saying, Honoka? Take this seriously!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Ahem, allow me to begin with our progress update. We've finished designing the School Idol Festival's website.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Please let us know what you think of the different designs we've come up with.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: We're also thinking about making a video advertisement to recruit some volunteer staff, so we've done some research into other events.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Since we need to compose new background music, I'd like to talk about what kind of theme we're going with.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Kayo-chin, Nico, and I have visited shopping districts and other places to ask them to put up our posters!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I'm planning on going to a lot more places with Rin to ask around!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm also looking to see if we can hold mini live shows in front of the train station to spread the word about the festival.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: W-Wow!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We started by talking to festival committee members and then put together a detailed list of how to run the live stages!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: And we've also come up with a few mock-up designs for the main and secondary stages, so please have a look at them.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I looked into how to make the stage and set designs and what materials we'll need for them, zura.

commands.speaker: Ruby
commands.line: I-I did some research about screens, cameras, and other filming-related equipment.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I've reached out to some people who might be able to help out with sound and lighting!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Uh-oh, I've been hit with an intense bout of drowsiness after hearing all of that in one go.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Snore*

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Kanata, please wake up. I've gathered everyone's information into a spreadsheet.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: I've thought of some exercises for building stamina. Don't brush it off as unnecessary. Stamina is the most vital for live shows!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You sure have a strict regimen, Kanan. Would following it make everyone collapse in exhaustion, though? What do you think, Yoshiko?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Heh. I need no stamina when I soar through the sky with my black wings. *Chuckle*

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: And I'm not Yoshiko! I'm Yohane!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: U-Um, everyone! Sorry! We weren't able to get any research done.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Everyone has been helping me out with my re-election preparations, and we've just been so busy with that.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: We will do our part in getting some research done by the next meeting.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Sorry about today. Rina-chan Board says, "Bow."

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Don't worry about it! We know how busy all you Nijigasaki members are.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: That's right! It would be even more of a problem if you lost the election and the club was abolished! Leave it all to us until the election is over!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: In exchange for this, we'll make you all work super hard once you win the election!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Exactly. You should focus on what you have to do right now.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We'll show you all just how much you can lean on us!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you, everyone! We really want to put all of our efforts into supporting Setsuna right now.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: (What do I do? I'm holding everyone back. It's my fault that we haven't been able to get any preparations done for the School Idol Festival.)

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: (Should I really continue taking everyone up on their goodwill?)
